tasks.title: Implement Watch Mode Command
tasks.description: Implement `cclint watch` command with chokidar for cross-platform file watching. Features: debouncing, recursive watching, auto-fix on change, clear terminal.

tasks.title: Implement Init/Scaffold Command
tasks.description: Implement `cclint init` with template system and project detection. Templates: minimal, typescript, python, go, monorepo, library, api.

tasks.title: Implement Pre-commit Hook Installation
tasks.description: Implement `cclint install-hook` and `uninstall-hook`. Auto-detect: husky, lefthook, pre-commit, raw git hooks.

tasks.title: Implement Interactive Fix Mode
tasks.description: Add --interactive flag to lint command. Step-through UI with apply/skip/apply-all/quit using inquirer.

tasks.title: Implement Explain Command
tasks.description: Implement `cclint explain [rule]` with rule metadata. Add getMetadata() to all rules.

tasks.title: Implement Diff-Aware Linting
tasks.description: Add --diff flag to lint command using simple-git. Filter violations by changed line ranges.

tasks.title: Implement Init/Scaffold Command
tasks.description: Implement the feature: Init/Scaffold Command. Implement `cclint init` command to generate starter CLAUDE.md files. Includes template system (minimal, typescript, python, go, monorepo, library, api), project type detection from package.json/pyproject.toml/go.mod, and interactive mode with prompts.

tasks.title: Implement Pre-commit Hook Installation
tasks.description: Implement the feature: Pre-commit Hook Installation. Implement `cclint install-hook` and `cclint uninstall-hook` commands. Auto-detect hook manager (husky, lefthook, pre-commit, raw git). Support --fix and --staged options for hook behavior.

tasks.title: Implement Interactive Fix Mode
tasks.description: Implement the feature: Interactive Fix Mode. Add --interactive flag to lint command for step-through fix review. Show violation details, current content, and suggested fix. Allow apply/skip/apply-all/quit actions using inquirer prompts.

tasks.title: Implement Core Foundation
tasks.description: Implement the feature: Core Foundation. The essential building blocks of the project.
